Line1.54219: Do you see now, Lacthan? Enough is enough! Perithan's soul is marred by sin!
Line13.AA9BD: Do not question my faith. I will fix this.
Line5.AA9BD: No! He wouldn't go that far!
Line9.54219: You know what must be done, Lacthan. If you do not do it, we will. Do you have the will to see it through?
